response.overview: A midnight visit to a cemetery turns tragic when a young woman is fatally injured. As her friends scramble for help, a mysterious stranger carries her off to his lair, where a kiss brings her back from the dead. Thus begins “Eternal Desires,” a new chapter of contemporary vampire lore that is an intriguing blend of romance, horror, and the supernatural. But it is that innocent act of compassion which complicates the lives of all it touches. Christopher has been waiting one hundred years for his lost love, Elizabeth. Allison desires only to serve her new master. Kristin’s jealousy and lust for power threatens the lives of all in her path. Tonight, the destinies of four souls will be altered forever.
response.title: Eternal Desires
